articles.author: Peter Fabricius
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE: UN majority condemns Russia's aggression on Ukraine; South Africa abstains - Daily Maverick
articles.description: South Africa has abstained from a United Nations General Assembly resolution condemning Russia’s aggression against Ukraine — which was adopted by an overwhelming majority of the world’s nations.
articles.content: South Africa stood with only 35 nations that abstained, while 141 voted for the resolution and five voted against it. Of South Africas BRICS partners, Russia of course voted against the resolution, I… [+5438 chars]

articles.title: EU checking if cryptoassets being used to bust Russian sanctions: EU official - CNA
articles.description:
